title: KSM SDK: .NET (Comprehensive)
description: A comprehensive guide to the Keeper Secrets Manager .NET SDK. Covers setup, auth (token, file, Base64 config), record lifecycle (create, retrieve, update, delete), password generation, file operations (upload, download, delete), folder management (create, list, update, delete), and caching.

steps.title: Step 3: Record Operations, Files & Password Generation
Step 4: Folder Management, Record Deletion & Caching
